articles.author: Chuck Culpepper
articles.title: Fernando Mendoza becomes Indiana’s first Heisman winner - The Washington Post
articles.description: The quarterback won the award Saturday night in New York over Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia, Ohio State quarterback Julian Sayin and Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love.
articles.content: Perhaps the steepest ascent to the Heisman Trophy in all its 91 turns concluded Saturday night in New York, when the storied award went to Fernando Mendoza, the charismatic quarterback from Indiana, … [+233 chars]

articles.author: Thomas Beaumont, Isabella Volmert, The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump couldn't insult his way to victory in Indiana redistricting battle. 'Folks in our state don’t react well to being bullied' - Fortune
articles.description: “Folks in our state don’t react well to being bullied,” said Mitch Daniels, the Republican former governor.
articles.content: If Indiana Republican senators had any doubt about what to do with President Donald Trumps redistricting proposal, he helped them make up their minds the night before this weeks vote.In a social medi… [+5208 chars]
